In England, in the seven days to 29 March, there were 28,079 new confirmed cases (49.9 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 22 March, there were 32,295 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 13% (4,216 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 03 April is 3,810,234 (6,769.3 cases per 100,000 population).
